headline: Partisans dig in after another school shooting
subHeadline: Can lawmakers find solutions to securing nation's schools? Reaction and analysis from the 'Special Report' All-Stars.

I think the second thing is -- you've seen James Clapper on CNN talking about how it was a good thing to have a spy in the Trump campaign. It's the most audacious thing I think I've heard of.
